SEARCH
Module CODEX
Package CODEX.distributed

Interface ClientActionsInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientGeneralInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientHandlerThread, ClientSCK, RMIClient
public interface ClientActionsInterface
This interface represents the actions which the clients (RMI and TCP) can perform.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayerToLobby

      void addPlayerToLobby(String playerNickname, int gameId) throws RemoteException, GameAlreadyStartedException, FullLobbyException, GameNotExistsException
      This method is used to add a single player to an already created lobby
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to join the lobby
      gameId - is the lobby the player wants to join
      Throws:
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full
      GameNotExistsException - if the game you're trying to access doesn't exist
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • chooseNickname

      void chooseNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NicknameAlreadyTakenException
      Once connected the player get to choose his nickname that must be different from all the other presents
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the String he wants to put as his nickname
      Throws:
      NicknameAlreadyTakenException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another user
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • createLobby

      void createLobby(String creatorNickname, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Parameters:
      creatorNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to create a new lobby
      numOfPlayers - is the number of player the creator decided can play in the lobby
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • playCard

      void playCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard, Coordinates position, boolean orientation) throws RemoteException
      This method "plays" the card selected by the Player in his own Board
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      selectedCard - the Card the Player wants to play
      position - the position where the Player wants to play the Card
      orientation - the side on which the Player wants to play the Card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • playBaseCard

      void playBaseCard(String nickname, PlayableCard baseCard, boolean orientation) throws RemoteException
      This method let the Player place the baseCard (in an already decided position) and, if all the players have placed their baseCard, it let the game finish the set-up phase giving the last necessary cards
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the Player that wants to play a card
      baseCard - is the base card that is played
      orientation - the side on which the Player wants to play the Card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the currentPlayer to draw a card from the decks or from the unveiled ones
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to draw the card
      selectedCard - is the Card the Players wants to draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • chooseObjectiveCard

      void chooseObjectiveCard(String chooserNickname, ObjectiveCard selectedCard) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the chooser Player to select his personal ObjectiveCard
      Parameters:
      chooserNickname - is the nickname of the player selecting the ObjectiveCard
      selectedCard - is the ObjectiveCard the player selected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • choosePawnColor

      void choosePawnColor(String chooserNickname, Pawn selectedColor) throws RemoteException, ColorAlreadyTakenException
      This method allows a player to choose the color of his pawn
      Parameters:
      chooserNickname - is the nickname of the player who needs to choose the color
      selectedColor - is the color chosen by the player
      Throws:
      ColorAlreadyTakenException - if someone chose the color before you
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String senderNickname, List<String> receiversNickname, String message) throws RemoteException
      This method sends a message from the sender to the receiver(s)
      Parameters:
      senderNickname - is the nickname of the player sending the message
      receiversNickname - is the list of nicknames of the players who need to receive this message
      message - is the string sent by the sender to the receivers
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method lets a player end the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who is going leave the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
